plot: A newsroom janitor discovers a lost smart phone, and on it is an addictive game that summons dark and malevolent forces.
title: Killer App
plot_es: A newsroom janitor discovers a lost smart phone, and on it is an addictive game that summons dark and malevolent forces.
plot_en: A newsroom janitor discovers a lost smart phone, and on it is an addictive game that summons dark and malevolent forces.
